page.title: 19A Day in the life of a Girl
page.content: My alarm clock woke me up at 7.15. I got out of bed and went to the bathroom to get washed. I got dressed in my school uniform. Mum made breakfast.At 8.00 I cleaned my teeth. From 8.05 I did my piano practice. I went to{Oak Cottage School}in mum's car, a Metro. I arrived at school and played hide and seek and went in at 8.50. I did some project work. At 10.30 I went out on the playground. After play I had maths. At 12.00 the bell went for lunch and play. After lunch I did some more project work. I wrote in books with pen and pencil.Then I went outside to play.After play I had an art lesson. Home time was 3.30. After school I went for my piano lesson. After dinner I went on our computer and then at 8.00 I went to bed.
